snippet: Despite a recommendation by the Texas Board of Pardons and Parole that Kelsey Patterson be spared due to severe mentally illness, he was executed for a double murder in 2004.
lead_paragraph: Despite a recommendation by the Texas Board of Pardons and Parole that Kelsey Patterson be spared due to severe mentally illness, he was executed for a double murder in 2004.

headline.main: Patterson’s Response to His Appeal Dismissal, and Other Case Documents
